## WatchLoop class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

This class implements a watch loop.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WatchLoop implements IWatchLoopState 
```
**Implements:** [IWatchLoopState](./operation-graph.iwatchloopstate.md)

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[runIPCAsync(host)](./operation-graph.watchloop.runipcasync.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Sets up an IPC handler that will run the inner loop when it receives a "run" message from the host. Runs until receiving an "exit" message from the host, or aborts early if an unhandled error is thrown.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[runUntilAbortedAsync(abortSignal, onWaiting)](./operation-graph.watchloop.rununtilabortedasync.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Runs the inner loop until the abort signal is aborted. Will otherwise wait indefinitely for a new run to be requested.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[runUntilStableAsync(abortSignal)](./operation-graph.watchloop.rununtilstableasync.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Runs the inner loop until the abort signal is cancelled or a run completes without a new run being requested.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
